text: After tonight would not even give one star if I had The Choice me and my husband ordered 2 pizzas breadsticks and chicken Alfredo took over 1hur to get  With my husband calling in between to see what was going on  When we got the food the …More

name: Christine Cull
text: We had our ordered delivered. They said it would be there in 30 minutes. It was an hour and half before we got it. Then to top it off they forgot half our order. When we finally got the rest of our order. The one pizza was completely under …More

name: Randell Kelly
text: The person taking my order was very well trained.  Fast service and friendly staff

name: Mary Ann Tiglio
text: On 6/2/2020 I ordered & paid for a pizza from the West Hazleton  location. After an hour I called to inquire where it was, I spoke to the manager who was rude & totally clueless. He said "oh, didn't  you  get it"? Why would I be calling  if …More

name: Lisa Stanavage
text: Love the buffet at lunchtime, always a good variety.  Service is always accommodating and pleasant. Lost a star because the handicap accessibility of the building is lacking, although the staff are very helpful. And, the bathroom desperately needs an update including lighting

name: Mike Lucas
text: Service was great!  The pizza was good. A long time ago we use to stop in at pizza hut. After remembering how good it was, we asked why did we stop coming in. That won't happen again. Back on track, steady customers again!!!

name: Brandi Benko
text: TheIr pizza and bread sticks rock!! Yum

name: Meanguns68
text: Great place and excellent pizza as is 09/27/2020

name: Sharon Blakney
text: Best  chain  franchise  pizza.  A tiny  bit  sad  that  the  personal  pan  pizza  seems a  little bit  smaller  than  it  used to be but  still  tasty and  customizable.  Good  service  and  clean  restaurant at  this  location. Nice  small  salad  bar  also  here.

name: Jason Vandemark
text: It was good and the people were nice and patient also understanding I am a fan of the cheeze it pizza

name: Ray Billman
text: Good pizza fast service

name: dan
text: Food tasted good the service was no so much. But they were friendly. I only give it 3 stars.

name: mike berta
text: pizza hut is not my first choice for food but it is better than some. there pan pizza is better than there competitors and there wings are also good. however, I think food quality has gone down hill in recent times. but I still recommend if looking for a quick bite to eat.

name: yeshads
text: The service was pleasant and good. The young lady, who served us was very courteous and helpful. A big thanks for her for making our meal excellent.

name: Sarah Novatnak
text: It's good service and great food.

name: richard garcia
text: Pizza here is not worth that money, its dry and simple

name: Sarah W
text: Best wings

name: Angel Marie
text: I use to love this place until tonight I ordered pizza at 6:15 using the app I got the email saying it will be delivered at 7:05pm my husband called the store at 7:15pm asking whats going on the guy told my husband that its on its way it …More

name: Connie Machamer
text: I don't think we will be going back.  We ordered a Hawaiian pineapple pizza and the chicken was left off of it, we ordered the salad bar not realizing it was over $9 for 2 salads and the salad bar was not even close to being worth that.  We …More

name: Jennabell
text: Haven't been there in years and was completely displeased with the service. Very poor. Breaks my heart to see a part of my childhood end up the way it is now.

name: Alyssa
text: Worst Pizza Hut I’ve ever been to.  Extremely dirty to the point I didn’t want to touch anything.  I watched our waitress walk past a dirty knife on the floor at least 4+ times and didn’t pick it up.  My pizza was touching my cinnamon …More

name: Carol Redline
text: We had Shannon who waited on us. Can not possibly give her enough praise. The other atmosphere was very enjoyable. I can honestly say we will be making our favorite pizza place.

name: Adrienne De.
text: Service was good, food too greasy and restaurant not clean.

name: Ryan Holley
text: Every Pizza Hut in PA is the dirtiest restaurant you'll ever eat in, and this one is no exception. We almost had a spider crawl into our food. Would be 1 star, but the pizza is always usually good

name: phil Weidemoyer
text: Excellent server .. prompt service , pizza the way it should be

name: matt neidlinger
text: We love this pizza but. The employees are always kind and courteous.

name: Sally Shaw
text: Waitress couldn't hear, didn't come to see if everything was ok. Pizza was like cardboard with sauce and cheese. Phone definitely doesn't look like what they picture on TV. Cheese bread sticks were the best part of dinner. Won't be back there ☹️.

name: Tammy ORourke
text: Hey, it's Pizza hut. I love the original pepperoni pan pizza. The convenience of ordering online is awesome and now they deliver. What more could you ask for. It's great

name: Sara Parsons
text: Wednesday night buffet is great. Extremely affordable and they keep up with getting fresh food out.

name: Mary-Lee Helbing
text: All the staff were very friendly --waitress Chelsea was excellent!

name: Heather Ryan
text: Great Wednesday all you can eat buffet. 5:30-7. Best pizza and great service from really nice people.

name: Lisa Tomes
text: Food was great! The service was horrible; only 3 other seated tables in the entire restaurant and they still messed up orders , serving wrong food to wrong table. We also got our appetizer 2 minutes before our pizza wasserved. So disappointed!!

name: Cathy lopez
text: Pizza was amazing and our waiter was polite and attentive but we sat at our table for a bit before our waiter approached the table.

name: Bob Mashinski
text: Great Food !! Great Service !! Looking forward to return visit.

name: Logan Decker
text: Wonderful experience! The manager on duty at the time of our visit (Tuesday around noon), Jay, was incredibly polite and very accommodating. All the staff was very attentive and polite. Food was fresh and they even made a veggie pizza for the buffet upon request. Great experience! Thanks for being so awesome, Pizza Hut team!

name: diane mashinski
text: We had a Terrific time and our meal very good

text: Very clean and nice servers

name: Rob B

name: Nicole Yeager
text: Lunch buffet starts when they open at 11:00a.m. They have a salad bar, bread sticks, some pasta dishes, pan and thin crust pizza a dessert pizza and Cinna sticks on the buffet. With 2 sodas and 2 buffets $17.47

name: Ashley Santos
text: It's better to order delivery it seems to be quicker that way. Sat here for over a hour for just one pie.

text: Time after Time I imagine they would eventually get better, and they never do. Everyone there is in a bad mood 24/7 and they can't get a single order right. This is the fifth time they messed up either an order for me or my family. Don't …More

text: Never crowded during sit in. Awesome pizza. Pretty much everything you can expect and want from a Pizza Hut.

name: Brenda Kreischer
text: I always loved Pizza Hut. Was very disappointed today because of so many flies in the restaurant. Sometimes one or two you can understand but not 6 just around our table. We also saw other people annoyed by the Flies.
